catalog_info.title: Advanced Russian: Russian Media
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Russian 102r and an additional course at the level of Russian 101 or above, or Russian 111 with permission of the instructor.
catalog_info.description: For students who already have experience reading Russian periodicals. Readings in and analysis of current topics and their presentation in the Russian press. Examination of the history of selected periodicals. Viewing of Russian news programs and analysis of language and content.
